name: DELETE_SEGMENT
body_snippet:
procedure DELETE_SEGMENT(parm_structure_id number,
                                           parm_segment_id number,
                                           parm_segment_no number
                                          )  is
begin
    
    if parm_segment_no    = 1  then
        delete wiz_segment01 t
        where t.structure_id = parm_structure_id and 
              t.segment_id = parm_segment_id;
     elsif parm_segment_no = 2  then
       delete wiz_segment02 t
        where t.structure_id = parm_structure_id and 
              t.segment_id = parm_segment_id;
     elsif parm_segment_no = 3  then
         delete wiz_segment03 t
        where t.structure_id = parm_structure_id and 
              t.segment_id = parm_segment_id;
     elsif parm_segment_no = 4  then
        delete wiz_segment04 t
        where t.structure_id = parm_structure_id and 
              t.segment_id = parm_segment_id;
     elsif parm_segment_no = 5  then
       delete wiz_segment05 t
        where t.structure_id = parm_structure_id and 
              t.segment_id = parm_segment_id;
     elsif parm_segment_no = 6  then
       delete wiz_segment06 t
        where t.structure_id = parm_structure_id and 
              t.segment_id = parm_segment_id;
     elsif parm_segment_no = 7  then
       delete wiz_segment07 t
        where t.structure_id = parm_structure_id and 
              t.segment_id = parm_segment_id;
     elsif parm_segment_no = 8  then
       delete wiz_segment08 t
        where t.st
